thread.title: Boys soccer: MKA tops Cedar Grove in Essex County Tournament
thread.title_full: Boys soccer: MKA tops Cedar Grove in Essex County Tournament

title: Boys soccer: MKA tops Cedar Grove in Essex County Tournament
text:
Boys soccer: MKA tops Cedar Grove in Essex County Tournament October 22, 2015 Last updated: Thursday, October 22, 2015, 12:32 AM The Montclair Times Print 
First-half goals from Ahmed Abukwaik, Dylan Ladda and Ben Kubany helped the 11th-seeded Montclair Kimberley Academy boys soccer team defeat No. 23 Cedar Grove, 3-0, in the preliminary round of the Essex County Tournament Monday. 
Goalkeeper John Baney made 3 saves to earn his fifth shutout of the season, as MKA extended its unbeaten streak to four games. The Cougars also defeated Belleville 2-0 on Oct. 10, and played to ties with Nutley (Oct. 13) and Wardlaw-Hartridge (this past Saturday). 
With their win on Monday, the Cougars (4-6-2) advanced to the ECTâ€™s Round of 16 to play sixth-seeded Newark Academy. That game kicked off yesterday, Wednesday, Oct. 21, after The Times went to press. 
The Newark/MKA winner will play Montclair High in the quarterfinals this Saturday, Oct. 24.
